alert.note: Alert for Rutherford; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:07PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rutherford and southwestern Wilson Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 407 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walterhill, or 11 miles north of Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Smyrna, La Vergne, Walterhill, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park and Gladeville. This includes Interstate 840 between mile markers 54 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
